Posts.Content: Jul 19, 2018 11:52PM Zoisite wrote: I am two years out and I had a square of tanned skin for a long time but it has faded. You can’t see the square anymore but it is still a little darker than the area around it. I hope yours heals faster than mine.
Posts.Title: Radiation "scars"? star2017 Bagsharon

Posts.Content: Oct 23, 2018 11:56PM Zoisite wrote: BlueGene, Happy Birthday I am so sorry to hear about your diagnosis. I have a question for you can you do the dmx with reconstruction instead of lumpectomy? Maybe skip radiation if possible? I had lumpectomy and radiation then ended up having to have dmx when they found more cancer. Reconstruction can be more complicated after radiation some women can skip radiation all together if the have a dmx. I have had done problems with the skin and muscle that was radiated. Either way I wish you all the best.
